alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 4:22AM EST until January 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST /11 AM CST/ MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. Locations west of US 31 could see isolated spots as low as 30 below zero early this morning before winds diminish. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until noon EST /11 AM CST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Road conditions may still be hazardous due to blowing and drifting snow, so if travelling drive with caution.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
